= Philosophy =

Democracy makes our work and living here possible.
It is the ASCII, the code big parts of the world work on.

It is about cooperation and colaboration.

But it hasn't existed always, nor will it.

And it is far from being perfect - it demands development to avoid beeing outdated and deprecated.
